mapper.sql: id, plugin_id, dev_type, manufacturer, product_type, system_version, sdk_version, uuid,imei, imsi, mac,location, ip,phone_num,pin, touchId, irides,voice,gesture_code,cpu,dev_name,dev_id,dev_info
mapper.insert: insert into t_auth_feature_info (id, plugin_id, dev_type, manufacturer, product_type, system_version, sdk_version, uuid,imei, imsi, mac,location, ip,phone_num,pin, touchId, irides,voice,gesture_code,cpu,dev_name,dev_id,dev_info ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{plugin_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dev_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{system_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdk_version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{touchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{irides,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gesture_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dev_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dev_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select (select concat_ws('@',if(tafi.dev_name = ''||tafi.dev_name is null, tafi.product_type, tafi.dev_name), tafi.product_type, DATE_FORMAT(tpi.start_time, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') , tafi.plugin_id, tpi.status) from t_auth_feature_info tafi where tafi.plugin_id = tpi.plugin_id) ret from t_plugin_info tpi, t_app_version_info tavi where tpi.bind_userphone = #{phoneNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and tpi.status != 6 and tavi.app_info_id = (SELECT app_info_id from t_app_version_info where app_code = #{appId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) and tpi.app_code = tavi.app_code

select if(tafi.dev_name = ''||tafi.dev_name is null, tafi.product_type, tafi.dev_name) devName, tafi.product_type devType, DATE_FORMAT(tpi.start_time, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') bindTime, tafi.plugin_id sotpId, tpi.status sotpStatus, tafi.dev_id devId from t_auth_feature_info tafi,t_plugin_info tpi, t_app_version_info tavi where tpi.bind_userphone = #{phoneNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and tafi.plugin_id = tpi.plugin_id and tpi.status != 6 and tavi.app_info_id = (SELECT app_info_id from t_app_version_info where app_code = #{appId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) and tpi.app_code = tavi.app_code

select (select concat_ws('@',if(tafi.dev_name = ''||tafi.dev_name is null, tafi.product_type, tafi.dev_name), tafi.product_type, DATE_FORMAT(tpi.start_time, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') , tafi.plugin_id, tpi.status) from t_auth_feature_info tafi where tafi.plugin_id = tpi.plugin_id) ret from t_plugin_info tpi, t_app_version_info tavi where tpi.bind_userphone = #{phoneNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and tpi.status = #{status, jdbcType = INTEGER} and tavi.app_info_id = (SELECT app_info_id from t_app_version_info where app_code = #{appId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) and tpi.app_code = tavi.app_code

select if(tafi.dev_name = ''||tafi.dev_name is null, tafi.product_type, tafi.dev_name) devName, tafi.product_type devType, DATE_FORMAT(tpi.start_time, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') bindTime, tafi.plugin_id sotpId, tpi.status sotpStatus, tafi.dev_id devId from t_auth_feature_info tafi,t_plugin_info tpi, t_app_version_info tavi where tpi.bind_userphone = #{phoneNum, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and tafi.plugin_id = tpi.plugin_id and tpi.status = #{status, jdbcType = INTEGER} and tavi.app_info_id = (SELECT app_info_id from t_app_version_info where app_code = #{appId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) and tpi.app_code = tavi.app_code
